T13D4310:175a-33: myu gu rlon pa cha snyoms btags //
T13D4310:175a-34: zhun mar dang sbyar dud pa brngub //
T13D4310:175a-35: de 'og sreg pa'i sha khu btung /
T13D4310:175a-36: glo rdol las byung blud pa la //
T13D4310:175a-37: thog mar stobs dang me drod skyed /
T13D4310:175a-38: nad gzhi mngal snum bcas pa'i //
T13D4310:175a-39: bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar blud //
T13D4310:175a-42: rgun 'bru'i chu dang sbyar ba dang //
T13D4310:175a-43: seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang //
T13D4310:175a-44: bi da ri yi khu bar sbyar //
T13D4310:175a-45: zhun mar la btsos ci rigs sbyin //
T13D4310:175a-46: lus zad pa la sbyar par bya //
T13D4310:175a-47: mkhris pa bad kan lus zungs rnams //
T13D4310:175a-48: zad pa'i zad byad lung pa can //
T13D4310:175a-49: mar dang karka ta sring gi //
T13D4310:175a-50: 'o ma ba la gnyis bskol blud /
T13D4310:175a-51: bi da ri 'am ka tam pa //
T13D4310:175a-52: ta la'i 'bras bu bskol ba yi //
T13D4310:175a-53: mar dang 'o ma gcin nang ni //
T13D4310:175a-54: mdog 'gyur bre bar byed la blud //
T13D4310:175a-55: pho mtshan rkub dang chu so dang //
T13D4310:175a-56: brla dbrag mjug to skrang zhing na //
T13D4310:175a-57: mar gyi nying khu yang ba 'am //
T13D4310:175b-0: @175b til mar bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang //
T13D4310:175b-1: skam sa'i srog chags sha dang ni //
T13D4310:175b-2: byi'u sogs dang ni khung na gnas //
T13D4310:175b-3: de bzhin mthu rtsal gyis zas tshol //
T13D4310:175b-4: sha za'i sha yang rim bzhin sbyin //
T13D4310:175b-5: dro bas bad kan 'jig byed la //
T13D4310:175b-6: rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag byed cing //
T13D4310:175b-7: dangs ma legs par rgyu byed bas //
T13D4310:175b-8: lus ni rgyas par byed par 'gyur //
T13D4310:175b-9: dbyi mo bar gyi 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4310:175b-10: rtsa ba bcu dang rtsi tra ka //
T13D4310:175b-11: rgya sran pi pi ling rtsa ba //
T13D4310:175b-12: pa ta rgya shug nas tshur bskol //
T13D4310:175b-13: li dong gra dang byi tsher ba //
T13D4310:175b-14: zur ba ma nu pi pi ling //
T13D4310:175b-15: karka ta yi sring gi btags //
T13D4310:175b-16: mnyam pa'i zhun mar dag dang bskol //
T13D4310:175b-18: lan tshva lnga ni btags te gzhug //
T13D4310:175b-19: de las ran par 'thungs na ni //
T13D4310:175b-20: zad byed lud pas nyed pa sel //
T13D4310:175b-21: ka sa mar da aa ru ra //
T13D4310:175b-22: gla sgang pa ta kad pa la //
T13D4310:175b-23: dong gra pi pi ling tang pa la //
T13D4310:175b-24: pu tse shel tshad zho gnyis gnyis //
T13D4310:175b-25: mar ni bre gang 'o ma dang //
T13D4310:175b-26: rgun chu bri bzhi'i nang du bskol //
T13D4310:175b-27: zad byed rims dang mchin pa'i nad //
T13D4310:175b-28: lud pa kun sel dge ba yin //
T13D4310:175b-29: kanda ka ri ba sha ka //
T13D4310:175b-30: sle tres rtsa ba 'bras bu dang //
T13D4310:175b-31: myu gu lo mar bcas pa rnams //
T13D4310:175b-32: bskol ba'i khu ba mar du btsos //
T13D4310:175b-33: lud pa'i rims kyis btab pa dang //
T13D4310:175b-34: yi ga 'chus pa'i nad rnams sel //
T13D4310:175b-36: tsha gsum ldan par bskol ba'ang phan //
T13D4310:175b-38: zas zos pa yi 'og tu blud //
T13D4310:175b-39: pi pi ling dang bu ram bskol //
T13D4310:175b-40: ra yi 'o ma mar bcas phan //
T13D4310:175b-41: 'di ni me drod sbyar phyir te //
T13D4310:175b-42: zad byed lus can gyis mar btung //
T13D4310:175b-43: nad kyis 'gags pa'i mid pa brang //
T13D4310:175b-44: rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag par byed //
T13D4310:175b-45: nas ni bre gang btsos pa ru //
T13D4310:175b-46: rnam par rgyal ba nyi shu btso //
T13D4310:175b-47: tshos nas de phyung mnyes nas der //
T13D4310:175b-48: bu ram rnying pa srang drug dang //
T13D4310:175b-49: pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang //
T13D4310:175b-50: ldong ros zho gnyis skyer khanda //
T13D4310:175b-51: zho gcig tshad ni bcu nas ni //
T13D4310:175b-52: slar yang bskol ba'i lde gu des //
T13D4310:175b-53: lud pa dbugs mi bde sel byed //
T13D4310:176a-0: @176a * // reg 'jam sgro rtsa bsregs nas ni //
T13D4310:176a-1: mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar //
T13D4310:176a-2: yang na rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs //
T13D4310:176a-3: mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi //
T13D4310:176a-4: lde gu zos na lud pa dang //
T13D4310:176a-5: dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed //
T13D4310:176a-6: ae randa yi thal ba ni //
T13D4310:176a-7: til mar tsha gsum bu ram bcas //
T13D4310:176a-8: lde gu'am bye'u rug aer randa'i //
T13D4310:176a-9: lo ma'i thal ba de bzhin bya //
T13D4310:176a-10: tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma ni //
T13D4310:176a-11: bu ram rnying pa mar sbyar phan //
T13D4310:176a-12: shug pa tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4310:176a-13: byi dang ga dang thang shing dang //
T13D4310:176a-14: ba la ra sna'i phye ma kun //
T13D4310:176a-15: de dang mnyam pa'i kha rar sbyar //
T13D4310:176a-16: yang na sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar //
T13D4310:176a-17: lde gu lud pa sel byed mchog //
T13D4310:176a-18: de bzhin na le sham gyi phye //
T13D4310:176a-19: mar dang sbrang rtsi khar rar bcas //
T13D4310:176a-20: aa ru ra dang bca' sga ni //
T13D4310:176a-21: bu ram dang ni bcas pa yi //
T13D4310:176a-22: ri lu khar ni bzhag gyur na //
T13D4310:176a-23: lud pa dbugs mi bde kun sel //
T13D4310:176a-24: yang na ba ru ra 'ba' zhig //
T13D4310:176a-25: lud pa sel bar byed pa yin //
T13D4310:176a-26: seng phrom aamra kha ra dang //
T13D4310:176a-27: bcas pa'i lde gumar dang brngos //
T13D4310:176a-28: thug pa zan dron nang du btab //
T13D4310:176a-29: slon bro skom dang lud pa dang //
T13D4310:176a-30: ma zhu tshad 'khru sel bar byed //
T13D4310:176a-31: kanda ka ri'i khu bar bskol //
T13D4310:176a-32: mungga'i khu bar legs g-yos pa //
T13D4310:176a-33: skyu ru ra ser se'u 'brur bcas //
T13D4310:176a-34: lud pa kun gyi sman gyur yin //
T13D4310:176a-36: mchu yis zas tshol khron rko dang //
T13D4310:176a-37: khung na gnas pa'i sha khu ni //
T13D4310:176a-38: zad byed lud pa can la sbyin //
T13D4310:176a-39: glo rdol gyis dud brngubs la gang //
T13D4310:176a-40: btung bar bcas pa bsten pa yang //
T13D4310:176a-41: zad byed lud par de gtang bya //
T13D4310:176a-42: gang yang gcong chen skabs su bshad //
T13D4310:176a-43: stobs skyes me drod skyed pa dang //
T13D4310:176a-44: rtsa rgyun bar byed pa'i sman //
T13D4310:176a-45: rnam grangs zad byed lud can la //
T13D4310:176a-46: stobs skyed thams cad bsngags pa yin //
T13D4310:176a-47: gang phyir 'dus pa las byung ba'i //
T13D4310:176a-48: zad byed lud pa mi bzad pas //
T13D4310:176a-49: de phyir nad stobs ji bzhin du //
T13D4310:176a-50: 'dus pa'i nad la phan pas gso //
T13D4310:176a-51: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
T13D4310:176a-52: gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o /
T13D4310:176b-0: // / @176b de nas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4310:176b-1: gang phyir skyigs bu dbugs mi bde //
T13D4310:176b-2: rgyu sogs mtshungs pas de yi phyir //
T13D4310:176b-3: gso ba'ang gcig ste des nyen la //
T13D4310:176b-4: thog mar dugs kyi nyer dpyad bya //
T13D4310:176b-5: snum dang lan tshva til mar byug /
T13D4310:176b-6: de yis bad kan bu gar 'gags //
T13D4310:176b-7: shin tu zhen pa zhu nas ni //
T13D4310:176b-8: khong par gnas pa legs par 'byin //
T13D4310:176b-9: bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen gyur cing //
T13D4310:176b-10: rlung ni lugs dang mthun par rgyu //
T13D4310:176b-11: 'jam zhing rlan gyur zas snum dang //
T13D4310:176b-12: yang na zho yi spris ma sbyin //
T13D4310:176b-13: de nas de la rlon 'jam btang //
T13D4310:176b-14: mchog tu lud pa rnying nad dang //
T13D4310:176b-15: skad 'gags pa la skyug sman sbyin //
T13D4310:176b-16: rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi pi pi ling //
T13D4310:176b-17: sbyar ba'am rlung la phan pa gtang //
T13D4310:176b-18: bad kan gyis ni gnong byas pa //
T13D4310:176b-19: gsal na bde ba thob 'gyur la //
T13D4310:176b-20: bu ga rnam par dag gyur nas //
T13D4310:176b-21: rlung ni gnod pa med par rgyu //
T13D4310:176b-23: ma du lung ga ster bu dang //
T13D4310:176b-24: shing na po lu kha ru tsha //
T13D4310:176b-25: ldan zas byin na bde bar 'byung //
T13D4310:176b-26: rgyam tshar bcas pa'i 'bras bu sgyur //
T13D4310:176b-27: cung zad dro ba'i bkru sman gtan //
T13D4310:176b-28: 'di dag bad kan gyis lam bkag //
T13D4310:176b-29: srog gi rlung ni 'khrugs las byung //
T13D4310:176b-30: de bas de lam bsal bya'i phyir //
T13D4310:176b-31: steng dang 'og tu sbyang byas phan //
T13D4310:176b-32: ji ltar 'bag par gyur pa'i chu //
T13D4310:176b-34: de bzhin rlung ni 'khyil gyur pa'i //
T13D4310:176b-35: de lam legs par sbyang bar bya //
T13D4310:176b-36: sbyang ba byas kyang ma dag pa'o //
T13D4310:176b-37: zhen pa'i dri ma du bas bsal //
T13D4310:176b-38: yung ba'i lo ma ae randa'i //
T13D4310:176b-39: rtsa ba rgya skyegs ldong ros dang //
T13D4310:176b-40: thang shing ba la spang spos bcas //
T13D4310:176b-41: btags te reng bu nyid du bya //
T13D4310:176b-42: de ni mar bskus dung ba rngub //
T13D4310:176b-43: yang na mar sbrus nas bsregs rngub //
T13D4310:176b-44: sgra chil sra rtsi pog dag gam //
T13D4310:176b-45: aa ka ru bzang mar sbyar rngub //
T13D4310:176b-47: spu 'am rgyus pa'i dud pa rngub //
T13D4310:176b-48: btsod dang gong dku rang ga / dge ba lpags mag ra yi'am //
T13D4310:176b-49: yang na gu gul ldong ros sma //
T13D4310:177a-2: / mo rtsa gu gu la aa ga ru //
T13D4310:177a-3: shug pa mar dang bcas dud rngub //
T13D4310:177a-4: dugs byar mi rung btang snyoms gzhag //
T13D4310:177a-5: brang dang med pa zhom pa la //
T13D4310:177a-6: bshol du med na 'jam dugs bya //
T13D4310:177a-7: kha ra dkar po'i 'o mas sam //
T13D4310:177a-8: dro 'jam tsam kyis dugs bya zhing //
T13D4310:177a-9: dkri dang ldan par bya ba'i dugs //
T13D4310:177a-10: dugs kyi le'ur bshad dugs bya //
T13D4310:177a-11: ma zhur de gso'i cho ga spyad //
T13D4310:177a-12: sbyor drags rlung shas cher gyur na //
T13D4310:177a-13: rlung nad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya //
T13D4310:177a-14: sha khu snum sogs par ra tsha sbyin //
T13D4310:177a-15: bsku ba dag gis zhi bar bya //
T13D4310:177a-16: bad kan ma slong dugs mi bya //
T13D4310:177a-17: nyam chung ba la sbang byas pas //
T13D4310:177a-18: rlung gi gnas rnyed gnas rnams ni //
T13D4310:177a-19: skam par byas nas srog 'phrog byed //
T13D4310:177a-20: de bas sman khu snum dang ni //
T13D4310:177a-21: lde gu lcogs kyis de zhir bya //
T13D4310:177a-22: skem zhing glo rdol tshad 'khru dang //
T13D4310:177a-23: khrag mkhris tsha ba las byung ba'i //
T13D4310:177a-24: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba la //
T13D4310:177a-25: mngar snum bsil stsogs dag gis gso //
T13D4310:177a-26: ku langtha dang rtsa ba bcu //
T13D4310:177a-27: bskol ba'i skam sa'i sha khu phan //
T13D4310:177a-28: shi kru par ta ka dang ni //
T13D4310:177a-29: ka sa mar da ba sha ka //
T13D4310:177a-30: la phug lo ma'i khu ba dang //
T13D4310:177a-31: nim pa'i myu gu las byung dang //
T13D4310:177a-32: kha lung bri ha ti khu phan //
T13D4310:177a-33: kanda ka ri byi ter ba //
T13D4310:177a-34: bil ba'i rkang dang gze ma dang //
T13D4310:177a-35: sle tres kar ka ta sring gi / tso tra ka dang ku langtha //
T13D4310:177a-36: chur bskol ba yi yu sha bya //
T13D4310:177a-37: yang na ra sna rtsa chung lnga //
T13D4310:177a-38: mungga ci tra kar bcas blud //
T13D4310:177a-39: tsi tra go snyod kha ru tsha //
T13D4310:177a-40: kar kata sring thug pa phan //
T13D4310:177a-41: yang na rtsa ba bcu sbyar ba'i //
T13D4310:177a-42: thug pa blud na lud pa dang //
T13D4310:177a-43: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde nad sel //
T13D4310:177a-44: rtsa ba bcu par sna dang //
T13D4310:177a-45: zur pa ga bra'i rtsa ba dang //
T13D4310:177a-46: bil ba gnyis dang ma nu dang //
T13D4310:177a-47: kar ka ta sring pi pi ling //
T13D4310:177a-48: lca ba sle tres bca' sga ni //
T13D4310:177a-49: bskol ba'i khu ba blud zhu nas ;
T13D4310:177a-50: / de nyid dang btsos thug pa blud //
T13D4310:177a-51: s'a lu drug cu pa dang gro //
T13D4310:177a-52: nas dang mungga rgya sman zos //
T13D4310:177a-53: lud pa snying nad rtsib logs zug //
T13D4310:177a-54: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel //
T13D4310:177a-55: yang na aarga'i myu gu yi //
T13D4310:177a-56: 'o ma dang sgrus nas kyi zan //
T13D4310:177a-57: sbrang rtsi dang bcas rtsa bcu sogs //
T13D4310:177b-0: @177b bskol ba'i khu bar sbyar ba blud //
T13D4310:177b-1: zas ni ksha ra shing kun mar //
T13D4310:177b-2: kha ru tsha dang se'u sbyar za //
T13D4310:177b-3: ma nu zur pa tsha ba gsum //
T13D4310:177b-4: ltar bu ba lung sbyar ba sbyin //
T13D4310:177b-5: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde skom dang //
T13D4310:177b-6: rtsa ba bcu ba bskol khu ba'am //
T13D4310:177b-7: yang na thang shing bskol khu'am //
T13D4310:177b-8: chang gi dangs ma blud par bya //
T13D4310:177b-9: pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba //
T13D4310:177b-10: ma ru ra dang byi dang ga //
T13D4310:177b-11: tsitra ka rnams lde gur sbyar //
T13D4310:177b-12: mar snod bskus te bskams pa ru //
T13D4310:177b-13: snod du dar ba zla gcig gzhag //
T13D4310:177b-14: de 'bungs me yi drod skyed cing //
T13D4310:177b-15: lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel //
T13D4310:177b-16: ba ta mur pa thang shing dang //
T13D4310:177b-17: sa ra la dang chang dangs ma //
T13D4310:177b-18: nub gcig bzhag ste lan tshva btab //
T13D4310:177b-19: de las khyer gang blud par bya //
T13D4310:177b-20: ga bra'i rtsa ba bca' sga'i phye 'am //
T13D4310:177b-21: ya baksha ra na le sham //
T13D4310:177b-22: bcas phye chu tshan blugs pa ban //
T13D4310:177b-23: ba spri ka ni bskol ba'i chu //
T13D4310:177b-24: btags pa lde gur byas bsres blud ;
T13D4310:177b-26: shri sha yi ni me tog ni //
T13D4310:177b-27: pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13D4310:177b-28: bad kan mkhris pa 'dres gyur pa'i //
T13D4310:177b-29: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel //
T13D4310:177b-30: cu gang pi pi ling dang ni //
T13D4310:177b-31: 'bras dang bca' sga mar dag las //
T13D4310:177b-32: khu ba mkhris pa las gyur sal ;
T13D4310:177b-33: / rlung dang ldan la reg 'jam sha / ri bong sha dang pi pi ling //
T13D4310:177b-34: mar dang sha spya ka yi khrag //
T13D4310:177b-35: lcam pa'i khu ba tsha ba gsum //
T13D4310:177b-36: mar dang 'o mar sbyar ba dang //
T13D4310:177b-38: rlung mkhris 'dres pa las gyur sel //
T13D4310:177b-40: / chu bskol bu ram dong gra btab //
T13D4310:177b-41: bi bi ling rtsa shing mngar dang //
T13D4310:177b-42: bu ram lca brta spangs khu //
T13D4310:177b-43: sbrang rtsi mar sbyar zos gyur na //
T13D4310:177b-44: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel //
T13D4310:177b-45: rta dang glang po ba lang phag //
T13D4310:177b-46: rnga mong bong bu lug dang ra //
T13D4310:177b-47: gang yang rung ba'i rtug ba tsir khu ;
T13D4310:177b-48: / sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bldags na phan //
T13D4310:177b-49: bad kan shas cher btung ba blud //
T13D4310:177b-50: rkang bzhi pa yi lpags rus spu //
T13D4310:177b-51: rmig pa bsregs la snag tshar byas //
T13D4310:177b-52: ya shva gandha'i lde gu ni //
T13D4310:177b-53: sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bad kan shad //
T13D4310:177b-54: che ba'i dbugs mi bde ba sel //
T13D4310:178a-2: ma nu pi pi ling bcas phan //
T13D4310:178a-3: yug snam pi pi ling bcas pa'am //
T13D4310:178a-4: ka pid ta yi khu ba'am //
T13D4310:178a-5: bil ba'i rkang khu skyu ru ra //
T13D4310:178a-6: pi pi ling dang rgyam tshar bcas //
T13D4310:178a-7: mar dang sbrang rtsi aa ru ra'am //
T13D4310:178a-8: tsha ba gnyis dang kha ru tsha //
T13D4310:178a-9: rgya shugs 'bras yos sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4310:178a-10: rgun 'bru pi pi ling dong gra //
T13D4310:178a-11: bu ram rgun 'bru yung ra sna //
T13D4310:178a-12: pi pi ling dang na le sham //
T13D4310:178a-13: til mar dang ni sbyar ba phan //
T13D4310:178a-14: lde gu sman gyi phye ma yang //
T13D4310:178a-15: sha khu chu dron tsha stsogs btung //
T13D4310:178a-16: ji ban ti dang gla sgang dang //
T13D4310:178a-17: bye'u rug pa dang shing tsha dang //
T13D4310:178a-18: sug smel gnyis dang ma nu dang //
T13D4310:178a-19: lca ba ta ma ma li ka / aa ru ra dang ga bra'i rtsa //
T13D4310:178a-20: dong ga dang ni ba la ka //
T13D4310:178a-21: zur pa ka ra ka ta sring gi //
T13D4310:178a-22: n' ga sar pi pi ling //
T13D4310:178a-23: tsa rong ci rigs sbyar nas ni //
T13D4310:178a-24: phye ma gnyis 'gyur kha rar bcas //
T13D4310:178a-25: rtsib logs nad rims lud pa sel //
T13D4310:178a-26: skyigs bu dbugs mi bde 'joms mchog / dong ga bu ram cha mnyam pa //
T13D4310:178a-27: bza' ba'am sna nas btang sman bya //
T13D4310:178a-28: yang na sgag skya 'am kun dong ngam //
T13D4310:178a-29: gri dza na yi rtsa bas bya //
T13D4310:178a-30: tsandan gyi ni khu ba dang //
T13D4310:178a-31: bud med nu zho snar blugs bya //
T13D4310:178a-32: sbrang ma'i rtug pa nu zhor sbyar //
T13D4310:178a-33: rgya skyegs khu ba dang sbyar blugs //
T13D4310:178a-34: rgyam tsha zhun mar dang bcas pa //
T13D4310:178a-35: nu zho mar dang bskol ba'am //
T13D4310:178a-36: mngar ba'i sman dang lde gur byas //
T13D4310:178a-37: de btung ba'am na nas gtad //
T13D4310:178a-38: kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa ni //
T13D4310:178a-39: grang dro res kyis blugs pa'am //
T13D4310:178a-40: de bzhin 'o ma bskol ba ni //
T13D4310:178a-41: sman gyi phye ma mar sbyar blugs //
T13D4310:178a-42: pi pi ling dang kha ru tsha //
T13D4310:178a-43: ya baksha ra sle tres dang //
T13D4310:178a-44: shing kun tso ra bye'u rug pa //
T13D4310:178a-45: mar dang zhog chur sbyar zhing //
T13D4310:178a-46: rtsa bcu'i khu bar bskol ba blud //
T13D4310:178a-47: yang na 'tsho byed bskol ba'i khu //
T13D4310:178a-48: sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud par bya //
T13D4310:178a-49: te dzo ba ti aa ru ra //
T13D4310:178a-50: pi pi ling dang pu tse shel //
T13D4310:178a-51: ru rta ma nu bu ti //
T13D4310:178a-52: tsitra ka dang pa la sha / zur pa lan tshva rnam gnyis dang //
T13D4310:178a-53: rdzi ban ti dang bil ba'i rkang //
T13D4310:178a-54: shu dag bal ba'i lo ma rnams //
T13D4310:178a-55: de dag zho ni gnyis gnyis bskol //
T13D4310:178a-56: shing kun zho phyed mar bre gang //
T13D4310:178a-57: bskol ba de ni 'thungs gyur na //
T13D4310:178b-0: @178b rkang lag la ni zhen pa'i rlung //
T13D4310:178b-1: gzhang 'brum dang ni pho ba'i nad //
T13D4310:178b-2: skyigs bu snying nad rtsib logs zug //
T13D4310:178b-3: myur du sel bar byed pa yin //
T13D4310:178b-4: zhun mar cha phyed bcas pa yi //
T13D4310:178b-6: thang la 'bar gyi 'am dug gi mar //
T13D4310:178b-7: zho can ha pu sha'i mar blud //
T13D4310:178b-8: chu grang glo bur blugs pa dang //
T13D4310:178b-9: sngangs dang sprugs dang 'jigs pa dang //
T13D4310:178b-10: dga' dang phrag dog dbugs bsdams dang //
T13D4310:178b-11: gnod pa'i 'bu yi sos btab dang //
T13D4310:178b-12: gang yang bad kan rlung 'joms sman //
T13D4310:178b-13: dro zhing rlung ni bde rgyun bsten //
T13D4310:178b-14: gang yang phal cher rlung gi nad //
T13D4310:178b-15: lhag par 'joms par byed pas spyad //
T13D4310:178b-16: thams cad la ni brta byas pa //
T13D4310:178b-17: tshabs chung gso bar sla ba yin //
T13D4310:178b-18: lhag par nyams smad pa yis ni //
T13D4310:178b-19: zhi ba'i thabs su 'gyur ma yin //
T13D4310:178b-20: de bas zhi ba brta ba'i thabs //
T13D4310:178b-21: mang po de la spyod par bya //
T13D4310:178b-22: lud pa dbugs mi bde gcong slon //
T13D4310:178b-23: skyigs bu'i sman ni phan tshun 'dre //
T13D4310:178b-24: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
T13D4310:178b-25: gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o /
T13D4310:178b-27: // / de nas gcong chen po gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4310:178b-28: stobs ldan nad ni mang gyur la //
T13D4310:178b-29: snum chos dugs byas sbyang ba ni //
T13D4310:178b-30: snum med ma yin nyam smod min //
T13D4310:178b-31: steng 'og gi ni sbyang bar bya //
T13D4310:178b-32: 'o ma po son chang bcas pa'am // sha khu mngar dang ldan pa'am //
T13D4310:178b-33: zhun mar btab pa'i nas thub ni //
T13D4310:178b-34: skyug sman bskol bas slon du gzhug / sham dur byid dong grar bcas //
T13D4310:178b-35: kha ra sbrang rtsi mar dang ni //
T13D4310:178b-37: rgun 'bru tang pa la bi da ri //
T13D4310:178b-38: yang na sha khur ldan pa yi //
T13D4310:178b-39: bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya //
T13D4310:178b-40: lto sbyang pa la brta ba dang //
T13D4310:178b-41: drod skyed cho ga spyad par bya //
T13D4310:178b-42: zas skom yi gar 'ong ba dang //
T13D4310:178b-43: rlung 'joms byed cing yang ba sbyin //
T13D4310:178b-44: s' lu drug cu pa dang gro //
T13D4310:178b-45: nas dang mungga lo gcig lon //
T13D4310:178b-46: ra yi 'o ma mar dang sha //
T13D4310:178b-47: sha za'i sha ni zang byed 'joms //
T13D4310:178b-48: bya rog 'ug pa sbyang ki gzig / ba lang rta dang ne le sbrul //
T13D4310:178b-49: bya rgod rnga mo bong bu khra'i //
T13D4310:178b-50: sha ni rgyu yis byin na phan /
T13D4310:179a-0: @179a // shes na de las smod pas na //
T13D4310:179a-1: slon zhing mdangs dang stobs mi 'gyur //
T13D4310:179a-2: bad mkhris ri dvags la sogs sha //
T13D4310:179a-3: rlung la mthu rtsal gzan tshol sha / tsho khur sbyar zhing phan pa dang //
T13D4310:179a-4: sha khu sogs la 'ang sbyar bar bya //
T13D4310:179a-5: yungs mar dag dang brngos pa'am //
T13D4310:179a-6: yang na ci rigs mar dang brngos //
T13D4310:179a-7: khu bar ldan zhing mnyen la snum //
T13D4310:179a-8: spod la sogs dang legs g-yos sbyin //
T13D4310:179a-9: de bzhin la phug rgya sran las //
T13D4310:179a-10: g-yos pa'i yu shar sbyar bar bya //
T13D4310:179a-11: pi pi ling bcas nas dang bcas //
T13D4310:179a-12: rgya sran bcas shing dong grar bcas //
T13D4310:179a-13: se'u 'bru skyu ru ra dang bcas //
T13D4310:179a-14: ra sha'i khu ba snum bcas blud //
T13D4310:179a-15: des ni cham pa la sogs pa //
T13D4310:179a-16: gnod pa drug ni sel bar 'gyur //
T13D4310:179a-17: mkhris pa sogs las khyad par du //
T13D4310:179a-18: chang rnying rtsa sbubs sbyong byed pa //
T13D4310:179a-19: ngoms pa nyid du blud par bya //
T13D4310:179a-20: rgun chang chang rnying chang dangs blud //
T13D4310:179a-21: rtsa ba chung ngu lngar bskol ba'am //
T13D4310:179a-22: tam la ka chur bskol ba'am //
T13D4310:179a-24: 'u su bca' sga bskol ba blud //
T13D4310:179a-25: de dang kha zas gtsang ba dag //
T13D4310:179a-26: 'bad pas bcos pa rjes mthun yin //
T13D4310:179a-28: sha kha'i nang du btso bar bya //
T13D4310:179a-29: ba la btab pa'i mar sbyar ba'am //
T13D4310:179a-30: sha za'i sha khur bcos pa sbyin //
T13D4310:179a-32: mar bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan //
T13D4310:179a-33: dzi ban ti dang shing mngar dang //
T13D4310:179a-35: ma nu zur pa pi pi ling //
T13D4310:179a-36: bya kri gze ma ba la dang //
T13D4310:179a-37: ta ma la ki autpala sngo ;
T13D4310:179a-38: / kyi lce ba dang byi tsher ba //
T13D4310:179a-39: lde gur byas dang mar bskol ba //
T13D4310:179a-40: gcong chen sel ba'i dam pa yin //
T13D4310:179a-41: 'bra go rgun 'brum ma du ka / pa ru sha dang pi pi ling //
T13D4310:179a-42: mar dang bskol bas skad 'gags dang //
T13D4310:179a-43: lud pa dbugs mi bde rims 'joms //
T13D4310:179a-44: rtsa bcu 'o mar bskol ba las //
T13D4310:179a-45: byung ba'i mar gsar gang yin de /
T13D4310:179a-46: pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13D4310:179a-47: skad 'gags sel ba'i dam pa yin //
T13D4310:179a-48: mgo brang rtsib logs gzer 'joms shing //
T13D4310:179a-49: lud pa dbugs mi bde rims sel //
T13D4310:179a-50: rtsa ba lnga ba lngar bskol ba'i //
T13D4310:179b-0: 'o ma las @179b byung mar gang yin //
T13D4310:179b-1: rtsa ba lnga pa lnga yi ni //
T13D4310:179b-3: bskol ba yi ni mar 'di yis //
T13D4310:179b-4: zang byed kyi ni stobs bdun 'joms //
T13D4310:179b-5: ya baksha ra tsha ba lnga //
T13D4310:179b-6: srang drug dang ni btsos pa'i mar //
T13D4310:179b-7: bre gang 'o ma cha mnyam byas //
T13D4310:179b-8: de yis bu ga dag byed cing //
T13D4310:179b-9: skran dang dmu rdzi mcher pa dang //
T13D4310:179b-10: pho nad skya rbab cham pa dang //
T13D4310:179b-11: lud pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams //
T13D4310:179b-12: skrang dang stod kyi rlung nad 'joms //
T13D4310:179b-13: ra sna ba la gze ma dang //
T13D4310:179b-14: ti ra ba ra sha khu'i chur //
T13D4310:179b-15: dzi ba ni ti dang pi pi ling //
T13D4310:179b-18: las byung mar 'o kha rar bcas //
T13D4310:179b-19: spyi yi sha ni srang brgya dag //
T13D4310:179b-20: chu bre sum cu gnyis na bskol //
T13D4310:179b-21: de yi brgyad cha lus pa ru //
T13D4310:179b-22: 'tsho byed bcu ni srang re gzhug / zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba //
T13D4310:179b-23: sha yi sman mar 'di blud pa'am //
T13D4310:179b-24: sha khu dang sbyar ci rigs sbyin //
T13D4310:179b-25: rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad //
T13D4310:179b-26: lud pa dbugs mi bde skad 'gags //
T13D4310:179b-27: skem zhing rtsib logs zug pa 'joms //
T13D4310:179b-29: sa nag tsha ba gsum tsi tra //
T13D4310:179b-30: sa ra ni ma seng ldeng dang //
T13D4310:179b-31: sa la'i 'bras bu las byung dang //
T13D4310:179b-32: go byed dang ni byi dang ga / srang ni brgyad brgyad tshad du byas //
T13D4310:179b-33: chu ni bcu drug 'gyur byas par //
T13D4310:179b-34: bcu drug char gnas bar du bskol //
T13D4310:179b-35: slar yang de dang mar bre gang //
T13D4310:179b-36: bskol ba 'dir ni cu gang ni //
T13D4310:179b-37: srang drug kha ra srang sum cu bcug /
T13D4310:179b-38: sbrang rtsi srang ni drug cug gzhug //
T13D4310:179b-39: dri sna gsum ni srang re gzhug / gzar bus dkrugs te lde gur byas //
T13D4310:179b-40: snga dro zos la'o ma btung //
T13D4310:179b-41: bcud len bsdams pa med pa yin //
T13D4310:179b-42: yid gzhungs mig rno tshe ring la //
T13D4310:179b-43: drod skyed skran dang gcong chen nad //
T13D4310:179b-44: skya rbab dang ni mtshan bar rdol /
T13D4310:179b-45: myur du 'joms par byed pa yin //
T13D4310:179b-46: gang yang zhun mar bu ram bcas //
T13D4310:179b-47: glo rdol la bshad zang byed sbyar //
T13D4310:179b-48: shing tsha sgug smel pi pi ling //
T13D4310:179b-49: bu gang kha ra rim nyis 'gyur //
T13D4310:179b-50: phye mar byas bza' 'am sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4310:179b-51: mar dang sbyar te lde gur zos //
T13D4310:180a-2: zad byed rtsib logs bad kan 'joms //
T13D4310:180a-4: sna sman dud pa rngub stsogs bya //
T13D4310:180a-5: de la'ang rlung las gyur pa la //
T13D4310:180a-7: bring+ga ra dza'i khu ba mar //
T13D4310:180a-8: bskol ba'am aa rda ga la bskol //
T13D4310:180a-9: dro 'jam zos rjes la blud na //
T13D4310:180a-10: yud pa lu dang skad 'gags sel //
T13D4310:180a-11: rgya shug lo ma'i lde gu ni //
T13D4310:180a-12: mar brngos rgya mtshar bcas pa'am //
T13D4310:180a-13: shing mngar dang ni pi pi ling //
T13D4310:180a-15: ha nas parn'i'i rtsa ba rnams //
T13D4310:180a-16: til mar bskol ba snar blugs bya //
T13D4310:180a-17: 'bras chan mar dang bu ram bcas //
T13D4310:180a-18: zos na de rjes chu tshan btung //
T13D4310:180a-19: 'o thug snum can blud pa dang //
T13D4310:180a-20: snum gyi dugs kyi cho ga bya //
T13D4310:180a-21: mkhris pa las gyur 'o ma'i shing //
T13D4310:180a-22: lde gu bskol ba'i zhun mar ni //
T13D4310:180a-23: sbrang rtsir bcas te de rjes ni //
T13D4310:180a-24: 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa blud //
T13D4310:180a-25: shing mngar ma du ka 'o thug / zhun mar bcas pa blud pa'am //
T13D4310:180a-26: ba la dri bzang bi da ri //
T13D4310:180a-27: shing mngar kshi ta bi da ri //
T13D4310:180a-28: rgyam tshar bcas pa bskol ba'i mar //
T13D4310:180a-29: skad 'gags sna sman bla med yin //
T13D4310:180a-31: pi pi ling dang bri ha ti //
T13D4310:180a-33: skad 'gags pa yi sna sman mchog / mngar ba'i sde tshan phye ma ni //
T13D4310:180a-34: sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu sbyin //
T13D4310:180a-35: bad kan las 'gyur tsha ba dang /
T13D4310:180a-36: zas rtsub ba gcin blud par bya //
T13D4310:180a-37: kad pha la dang skyu ru ra //
T13D4310:180a-38: tsha gsum til mar sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13D4310:180a-40: kru trug tres dang dbyi mong dang //
T13D4310:180a-41: aa ru ra dang sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13D4310:180a-42: nas thug til mar zhun mar dang //
T13D4310:180a-43: pi pi ling dang skyur rung sbyar //
T13D4310:180a-44: bca' sga dang ni pi pi ling //
T13D4310:180a-45: bza' ba'am skyug sman rnon po bsten //
T13D4310:180a-46: sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsir bsres //
T13D4310:180a-47: mngar ba'i sman dang lhan cig bskol //
T13D4310:180a-49: chen por smras pa'i 'gags nad sel //
T13D4310:180a-50: yi ga 'chus la sna tshogs zas //
T13D4310:180a-51: phan pa'i sman dang sbyar ba sbyin //
T13D4310:180a-52: phyi dang nang ni sbyang ba dang //
T13D4310:180a-53: sems dga' yid dang mthun sman sbyin //
T13D4310:180a-54: dus gnyis su ni so shing dag //
T13D4310:180a-55: bca' zhing kha ni sbyang bya zhing //
T13D4310:180a-56: bska bas kha ni bkru ba dang //
T13D4310:180b-0: @180b rjes su mthun pa'i dud pa rngub //
T13D4310:180b-1: da lis kyi ni ru lu dang //
T13D4310:180b-2: kha ra ga bur bcas pa sbyin //
T13D4310:180b-3: 'bras khu zla ba'i zer ltar dkar //
T13D4310:180b-4: bza' ba yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog //
T13D4310:180b-6: ha re nu dang pi pi ling //
T13D4310:180b-7: byi dang ga dang ra sna dang //
T13D4310:180b-8: rgyam tsha dang ni dong gra dang //
T13D4310:180b-9: sug smel ga bra'i rtsa ba dang //
T13D4310:180b-10: nas tshig mkhus pa'i thal ba dang //
T13D4310:180b-11: shing kun bcas pa mar ram ni //
T13D4310:180b-12: chang gi dangs mar sbyar te btung //
T13D4310:180b-13: shu ngag chus ni slon du gzhug //
T13D4310:180b-14: mkhris gyur bu ram chus slon gzhug //
T13D4310:180b-15: kha ra dang ni zhun mar ram //
T13D4310:180b-16: rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin //
T13D4310:180b-17: bad kan nim pa'i chus slon gzhug //
T13D4310:180b-18: la la phud dang dong gra'i chu //
T13D4310:180b-19: sbrang rtsi 'am chang rnying rno sbyar ba //
T13D4310:180b-20: bu ram sbrang rtsi chang bcas blud //
T13D4310:180b-21: ha renu sogs phye ma ni //
T13D4310:180b-22: sngar bshad chu tshan sbyar ba blud //
T13D4310:180b-23: sug smel dang ni shing tsha dang //
T13D4310:180b-24: n'a ga bus pa na la le sham /
T13D4310:180b-25: pi pi ling dang bcas sga rnams //
T13D4310:180b-26: rim bzhin cha res bskyed phye ma //
T13D4310:180b-27: kha ra dag dang mnyam sbyar bas //
T13D4310:180b-28: mchil mang yi ga mchus pa dang //
T13D4310:180b-29: snying dang rtsib logs na lud pa //
T13D4310:180b-30: dbugs mi bde dang mgul nad 'joms //
T13D4310:180b-31: la la phud dang da trig dang //
T13D4310:180b-32: star bu bca' sga se'u 'bru dang ;
T13D4310:180b-33: / rgya shug zho ni gnyis gnyis byas //
T13D4310:180b-34: kha ra srang bzhi 'u su dang //
T13D4310:180b-35: go snyod shing tsha kha ru tsha //
T13D4310:180b-36: zho re pi pi ling 'bru brgya //
T13D4310:180b-37: na le sham ni nyis brgya dag / phyer btags
T13D4310:180b-38: yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog / yid 'ong phyis 'gags
T13D4310:180b-39: pa dang // lud pa snying ga rtsib logs na //
T13D4310:180b-40: mcher pa gzhang 'brum pho nad sel //
T13D4310:180b-41: bal bu'i lo man le sham //
T13D4310:180b-42: dong gra dang ni pi pi ling //
T13D4310:180b-43: go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed //
T13D4310:180b-44: shing tsha sug smel dang po'i phyed //
T13D4310:180b-45: pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur gyi //
T13D4310:180b-46: kha rar sbyar ba'i phye ma de //
T13D4310:180b-47: drod skyed yi ga 'byed pa dang //
T13D4310:180b-48: lud pa lu dang dbugs mi bde //
T13D4310:180b-49: yi ga 'chus dang slon bro dang //
T13D4310:180b-50: mcher pa snying nad rtsib logs zug //
T13D4310:180b-52: rlung 'khyil ba ni bde rgyu byed //
T13D4310:180b-53: sug smel shing tsha pu shel tse //
T13D4310:180b-54: zho ni gnyis gnyis byas pa dang //
T13D4310:180b-55: n' ga ge sar srang phyed dang //
T13D4310:181a-1: bha dra srang phyed gzhug / phye btags bu ram rnying pa ni //
T13D4310:181a-2: srang ni nyi shu lnga ni bskol //
T13D4310:181a-3: sprus te zho gnyis tshad ri lu //
T13D4310:181a-4: byas pa'i yon tan de dang mnyam //
T13D4310:181a-5: aa rga sel tre sa ksha ra'i chur //
T13D4310:181a-6: nas dang nub gcig spangs nas ni //
T13D4310:181a-7: chu dang zan ni sprus nas su //
T13D4310:181a-8: byin te nyams stobs ldan slon gzhug / de bzhin
T13D4310:181a-9: skams sa'i srog chags sha / bsregs pa kha dang
T13D4310:181a-10: tsha sbyar sbyin / zas ni skam zhing rab yang dang //
T13D4310:181a-11: tsa na ka sogs khu ba blud //
T13D4310:181a-12: bad kan gyis rab mchil ma mang //
T13D4310:181a-13: rlung gis mchil mang skyed par byed //
T13D4310:181a-14: de ni bad kan mchil mar bshad //
T13D4310:181a-15: snum dang dro bas de bsal bya //
T13D4310:181a-16: rims 'di cham pa dag dang ni //
T13D4310:181a-17: slon pa'i nad la'ang sbyar bar bya //
T13D4310:181a-18: mchog tu cham par bsku ba dang //
T13D4310:181a-19: snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bstan //
T13D4310:181a-20: mgo dang lkog ma rtsib logs su //
T13D4310:181a-21: 'bras khur snum bcas dugs bya zhing //
T13D4310:181a-22: lan tshva skrur dang kha dang tsha //
T13D4310:181a-23: sha khu snum dang bcas pa sbyin //
T13D4310:181a-24: mgo bo snying ga rtsib logs gzer /
T13D4310:181a-25: nad gzhi ji bzhin gso bar bya //
T13D4310:181a-26: chu dang rlan can gnas pa'i sha / legs sbyar dkri ba'i dugs bya zhing //

T13D4310:184a-25: d'ur ba la stsogs rtsa ba lnga //
T13D4310:184a-26: bskol te kha ra btab pa'am //
T13D4310:184a-27: 'bras yos phyer sbyar skyo ma'ang bsngags //
T13D4310:184a-28: nas rjen chag tshe sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4310:184a-29: kha ra btab pa grang mo'ang phan //
T13D4310:184a-30: de bzhin nas thugs s'a lu dang //
T13D4310:184a-31: ko tra pa ni rnying pa ni //
T13D4310:184a-32: 'o ma bsil zhing nus bsil ba'i //
T13D4310:184a-33: sman dang bskol ba'i kha zas ni //
T13D4310:184a-34: nang chu grang gis bkrus nas //
T13D4310:184a-35: kha ra sbrang rtsi sbyin pa bsngags //
T13D4310:184a-36: skam sa'i sha khu la na tshva skyur /
T13D4310:184a-37: med cing mar dang brdos pa yang //
T13D4310:184a-38: de bzhin mungga stsogs khu ba //
T13D4310:184a-39: 'tsho byed sde tshan khu bar bcas //
T13D4310:184a-40: sna sman 'o ma mar bsil sman //
T13D4310:184a-41: bskol ba'am bu ram shing khu phan //
T13D4310:184a-42: skom sa la mkhur ba bkang nas ni //
T13D4310:184a-43: mdog nas las bshad byas pa'ang phan //
T13D4310:184a-44: tsha rims bshad pa'i lde gu sogs //
T13D4310:184a-45: rtsol ba chung zhing sems dga' dang //
T13D4310:184a-46: chu bo mtsho ni chen po stsogs //
T13D4310:184a-47: dran pa dang ni mthong ba phan //
T13D4310:184a-48: skom dang rlung las gyur pa las //
T13D4310:184a-49: zho ni bu ram bcas pa bsngags //
T13D4310:184a-50: sha khus nyams brtas bid ri //
T13D4310:184a-51: stsogs te bskol nas bsgrangs pa phan //
T13D4310:184a-52: mkhris gyur au dum b'a ra smin //
T13D4310:184a-53: khu bar kha btab pa phan //
T13D4310:184b-0: yang na de bskol bsgrangs @184b pa'am ;
T13D4310:184b-1: / sha ri bstsogs sde tshan chu //
T13D4310:184b-2: sde tshan de 'dra bskol khu ba //
T13D4310:184b-3: bsgrangs ba kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13D4310:184b-4: mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang /
T13D4310:184b-5: 'o ma can shing bskol de bzhin //
T13D4310:184b-7: lcang ma n+ya gro dha'i lo ma //
T13D4310:184b-8: ku sha 'jag ma'i rtsa ba dang //
T13D4310:184b-9: shing mngar chu ni bskol ba'ang phan //
T13D4310:184b-10: rims la phan sman rgun 'brum stsogs //
T13D4310:184b-11: snying po lnga yi chu blud phan //
T13D4310:184b-12: bad kan las gyur nim pa ni //
T13D4310:184b-13: chu mchog bskol bas slon du gzhug / bil ba su tsha ba lnga //
T13D4310:184b-14: 'jag ma kru rtug tres bskol blud //
T13D4310:184b-15: yang na skyer pa chu bskol la //
T13D4310:184b-16: kha ra sbrang rtsi btab pa blud //
T13D4310:184b-17: mungga'i khu ba pa to la //
T13D4310:184b-18: nim pa'i lo ma tsha gsum bcas //
T13D4310:184b-19: nas zan ma khur bkang rnon po dang //
T13D4310:184b-20: sna sman lde gu rnon po'ang bsten //
T13D4310:184b-21: nyes kun ma zhu nges 'joms pas //
T13D4310:184b-22: de bzhin smon gyi bya ba'ang bsngags //
T13D4310:184b-23: go bye shu dag cha ba gsum //
T13D4310:184b-24: 'bras bu skyur pa'am chu tshan nam //
T13D4310:184b-25: zho ga chu dang btung ba bsngags //
T13D4310:184b-26: zas kyi nyes 'byung dus shes pas //
T13D4310:184b-27: thug sla'am skyo ma bsil ba blud //
T13D4310:184b-28: ngal bas skom la sha khu'am //
T13D4310:184b-29: skyo ma kha rar bcas pa blud //
T13D4310:184b-30: tsha bas bskol la kha rar bcas //
T13D4310:184b-31: nas dang rgya shug phye skyo blud //
T13D4310:184b-32: lus kun til gyi lde gu dang //
T13D4310:184b-33: rang skyur bcas pas bsku bar bya //
T13D4310:184b-34: chu bsil khrus las skom gyur chang //
T13D4310:184b-35: chur bsres pa'am bur chu blud //
T13D4310:184b-36: chang ni phyed bcas pa blud //
T13D4310:184b-37: lan tshva skyur dang bcas 'khrus bya //
T13D4310:184b-38: snum bcas me drod rab rno la //
T13D4310:184b-39: rang bzhin bsil ba'i chu blud bya //
T13D4310:184b-40: snum ma zhu la chu tshan blud //
T13D4310:184b-41: zhu las skom la thug pa blud //
T13D4310:184b-42: zas snum zos pas skom dang 'gyur //
T13D4310:184b-43: kha ba dang mnyam bu ram chu //
T13D4310:184b-44: bu ram sogs zas zos la skom //
T13D4310:184b-45: chu dron blud la de slon bya //
T13D4310:184b-46: gcong chen las byung gcong la phan ;
T13D4310:184b-47: / thams cad nyams ni brta ba phan //
T13D4310:184b-48: skem zhing nyam chung khong rtsub la //
T13D4310:184b-49: sha khu'am ra yi 'o ma blud //
T13D4310:184b-50: stod rgyu'i rlung la'o ma dang //
T13D4310:184b-51: zad byed lud pa'i sman bsil blud //
T13D4310:184b-52: nad rkyen las gyur 'u su ni //
T13D4310:184b-53: 'bras bskol kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas //
T13D4310:185a-2: btung ba'i bya ba kun kyang bsngags //
T13D4310:185a-3: skom zhing sngar gyi nad kyis gzir //
T13D4310:185a-4: chu dang 'phrad bar ma gyur na //
T13D4310:185a-5: 'chi ba'am yun ring ba yi nad //
T13D4310:185a-6: rnyed par 'gyur bas de yi phyir //
T13D4310:185a-7: goms pa'i zas sgom sman gyis ni //
T13D4310:185a-8: de yi skom dad myur bsal bya //
T13D4310:185a-9: de bsal nad ni gzhan dag kyang //
T13D4310:185a-10: gso ba nyid du nus pa yin //
T13D4310:185a-11: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
T13D4310:185a-12: gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o /
T13D4310:185a-14: // / de nas chang nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4310:185a-15: nyes pa gang zhig shas cher mthong //
T13D4310:185a-16: de ni dang por gso bar bya //
T13D4310:185a-17: yang na chang nad nad gzhi mtshungs //
T13D4310:185a-18: bad kan gnas kyi rim pas gso //
T13D4310:185a-19: mkhris pa rlung gi mthar thug par //
T13D4310:185a-20: chang nad phal cher 'byung ba yin //
T13D4310:185a-21: dman dang log pa drag 'thungs las //
T13D4310:185a-22: nad ni gang zhig skyes gyur pa //
T13D4310:185a-23: de nyid cha mnyam 'thungs pa yis //
T13D4310:185a-24: chad nyid kyis ni zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4310:185a-25: chang dang dug ni mtshungs pa las //
T13D4310:185a-26: dug ni rno stsogs yon tan gyi //
T13D4310:185a-27: nus pa shin tu che bas na //
T13D4310:185a-28: dug gzhan la ni ltos pa ni //
T13D4310:185a-29: rna tshe lhag par 'thungs pa dang //
T13D4310:185a-30: tsha zhing skyur ba dag gis ni //
T13D4310:185a-31: chang gis zas kyi ro bsrul zhing /
T13D4310:185a-32: 'ju nyer ba tsha bro gang yin //
T13D4310:185a-33: myos dang skom rmongs nang du tsha //
T13D4310:185a-34: rims dang mgo 'khor skyed par byed //
T13D4310:185a-35: chang gis bslangs pa'i nad kyis ni //
T13D4310:185a-36: rlung rgyu'i bu ga bkag gyur pas //
T13D4310:185a-37: mgo dang rus pa chings rnams su //
T13D4310:185a-38: mi bzad par ni skyed par byed //
T13D4310:185a-39: sbyor brjes mthun gyur pa yi //
T13D4310:185a-40: chang nyid kyis ni de sel 'gyur //
T13D4310:185a-41: chang nad ma zhu zhu gyur na //
T13D4310:185a-43: ba tsha ro ni skyur dang phrad //
T13D4310:185a-44: mngar ba nyid du myur du 'gyur //
T13D4310:185a-45: nad ni 'ju bar byed nus pas //
T13D4310:185a-46: skyur ba kun las chang mchog yin //
T13D4310:185a-47: sngar bshad rno dang dro stsogs dang //
T13D4310:185a-48: de bzhin drod skyed stsogs yon tan /
T13D4310:185a-49: de nyid goms pa'i dbang gis ni //
T13D4310:185a-50: 'di yis lus zungs mnyam byed mchog / zhag bdun nam zhig zhag brgyad par //
T13D4310:185a-51: chang na sman gyi sbyor ba bya //
T13D4310:185a-52: dus 'di tsam gyis lam log par //
T13D4310:185b-0: gnas pa'i @185b chang nad zhi bar 'gyur //
T13D4310:185b-1: sman ni byas gyur nas chad nad //
T13D4310:185b-2: de phan chang ni rjes 'brel pa'i //
T13D4310:185b-3: nad gang yin pa de la sman //
T13D4310:185b-4: nad dmigs ji bzhin sbyin par bya //
T13D4310:185b-5: de la rlung che ba la //
T13D4310:185b-6: skyur rtse chen pod trig dang //
T13D4310:185b-7: rgya shug se 'brug go snyod dang //
T13D4310:185b-8: la la phu dang ha pu sha / zi ra tsha gsum lan tshva gsum //
T13D4310:185b-9: sge'u gsher phye chang sbyar ba blud //
T13D4310:185b-10: sreg sha ldum rngad bcas pa dang //
T13D4310:185b-11: snum dang ldan pa'i zas sbyin no //
T13D4310:185b-12: snum zhing dro skyur lan tshvar bcas //
T13D4310:185b-13: sha tshon khu ba blud pa'am //
T13D4310:185b-14: aa mra aa mra ta ka gtubs //
T13D4310:185b-15: g-yos sbyar ba yi drug pa'am //
T13D4310:185b-16: gro dang ma shal las byas pa //
T13D4310:185b-17: rnying zhing yi gar 'ong ba dang //
T13D4310:185b-18: sge sher bcas ba'i khu ba ni //
T13D4310:185b-19: tsha dang sha sogs nang bcug pa'am //
T13D4310:185b-20: chang ni dri zhim bsil ba dang //
T13D4310:185b-21: legs langs dangs shing tshar bcas phan //
T13D4310:185b-22: se 'bru'am rtsa ba chung lnga bskol //
T13D4310:185b-25: rang skyur dangs ma blud par bya //
T13D4310:185b-26: lus bsku dril dang bkru ba dang //
T13D4310:185b-27: gos ni dro zhing mthug pa dang //
T13D4310:185b-28: aa ka ru yi dud pas ba dug //
T13D4310:185b-29: gur gum aa ka ru yis byug / chung ma nu ma ro smad mdzes //
T13D4310:185b-30: lang tshor ldan zhing yan lag dro //
T13D4310:185b-31: dga' bas 'khyud par byed pa dang //
T13D4310:185b-32: bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa'ang phan //
T13D4310:185b-33: mkhris ba shas cher chu mang ba'i //
T13D4310:185b-34: sbrang rtsi khar dang ldan pa'i //
T13D4310:185b-36: bha bya rgyun 'brum ba ru sha'i //
T13D4310:185b-37: bu bsgrangs phye dang khar rar bcas //
T13D4310:185b-38: tung ba'ang de 'dra blud par bya //
T13D4310:185b-39: yang na mngar ba'i sde tshan gar ba'i sde tshan bskol //
T13D4310:185b-40: khu ba chang bsres sbrang rtsi btab //
T13D4310:185b-41: s'a lu drug cu pa'i tshan dang //
T13D4310:185b-42: ri bong gong srog gtsod kyi sha //
T13D4310:185b-43: tsa na mungga sgyu ru ra //
T13D4310:185b-45: bad kan mkhris 'dres las gyur pa //
T13D4310:185b-48: chang ngam chu grang bu ram shing //
T13D4310:185b-49: khu ba'am rgun chu mang blud la //
T13D4310:185b-50: slon gzhug 'dres ba'i nad la ni //
T13D4310:185b-51: skyo ma la sogs rims pas phan //
T13D4310:185b-52: de yis me drod 'bar gyur pas //
T13D4310:185b-53: zas dang nyes lhag smin par byed //
T13D4310:185b-54: lud pa mchil ma khrag bcas 'byung //
T13D4310:186a-0: @186a * // rtsib logs nu mar gzer ba dang //
T13D4310:186a-1: tsha dang bcas pa'i skom dad dang //
T13D4310:186a-2: snying dang brang ni na ba la //
T13D4310:186a-3: sle tres ga dur bskol ba'am //
T13D4310:186a-4: yang na pa to la bskol bu //
T13D4310:186a-5: bca' skar bcas pa blud bya zhing //
T13D4310:186a-6: gong ma sreg gi sha sbyin bya //
T13D4310:186a-7: mkhris pa rlung ni rgyas gyur pas shin tu shas cher skom gyur na //
T13D4310:186a-8: rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed pa'i //
T13D4310:186a-9: rgun chu bsgrangs pa blud par bya //
T13D4310:186a-10: zhu nas ra sha'i khu ba ni //
T13D4310:186a-11: mngar dang sgyur ba'i sman sbyar sbyin //
T13D4310:186a-12: skom na chu mang bsres pa yi //
T13D4310:186a-13: chang blud ra ror mi 'gyur bsrung //
T13D4310:186a-15: yang na 'dab ma bzhi bskol ba'am //
T13D4310:186a-16: autpala pa to la sogs sam //
T13D4310:186a-17: rang bzhin gyis ni bsil ba blud //
T13D4310:186a-18: chang mang 'thungs pas chu yi khams //
T13D4310:186a-20: gre ba rkan mchu skam 'gyur zhing //
T13D4310:186a-21: lce ni 'byin cing gcod byed la //
T13D4310:186a-22: mtshan mo rlung gis bsil bar byas pa'i //
T13D4310:186a-23: chu ni yog tshad blud par bya //
T13D4310:186a-24: rgya shugs se 'bru da trig dang //
T13D4310:186a-25: tsug tral chu ba'i khu ba //
T13D4310:186a-26: skyur ba lnga yis khar bskus na //
T13D4310:186a-27: 'phral du skom dang sel bar byed //
T13D4310:186a-28: chang 'thungs drod ni khrag mkhris dang //
T13D4310:186a-29: 'dres pas pags pa khyab gyur pas //
T13D4310:186a-30: mi bzad tsha ba skyed byed de //
T13D4310:186a-31: der ni rab bsil cho ga bya //
T13D4310:186a-32: ma zhu sha khus tshim byas la //
T13D4310:186a-33: ro hi ni las gtar ga gdab //
T13D4310:186a-34: slon dang smyung ba dag gis kyang //
T13D4310:186a-35: bad kan shas cher skug sman dang //
T13D4310:186a-36: smyung ba bca' sga sti ra dang //
T13D4310:186a-37: kanda ka ri ba la ka / gang yang rung ba'i chu blud bsal //
T13D4310:186a-38: ma zhu med cing bkres dus su //
T13D4310:186a-39: sbrang rtsi mang po blud par bya //
T13D4310:186a-40: sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang /
T13D4310:186a-41: chang rnying dag gam rgun chang ngam //
T13D4310:186a-42: rtsub pa'i skyo mar sbyar ba ni //
T13D4310:186a-43: dong gral la phud bcas blud //
T13D4310:186a-44: nas dang gro zan nyung shas la //
T13D4310:186a-45: rgya sran yu sha nyung zad bcas //
T13D4310:186a-46: chu tshan kha dang tsha bar bcas //
T13D4310:186a-47: mar ni nyung zad bcas pa sbyin //
T13D4310:186a-48: la phug skam por sha'i khu //
T13D4310:186a-49: skam sa'i srog chags sha khu ni //
T13D4310:186a-50: star bud trig pa to la //
T13D4310:186a-51: tsha ba gsum dang se 'brur sbyar //
T13D4310:186a-52: bca' sga na le sham mang btab //
T13D4310:186b-0: rjen rngad @186b gtubs pa dang ldan zhing //
T13D4310:186b-1: sgyur rtse chen po'i khu bas skyur //
T13D4310:186b-2: brngos shing khu ba med pa dang //
T13D4310:186b-3: ka ra mar dang ka ri ra //
T13D4310:186b-5: lan tshva brgyad po legs bor dang //
T13D4310:186b-6: gtubs shing be reg ltar bcos pa //
T13D4310:186b-7: me drod tshod las sha spyin zhing //
T13D4310:186b-8: sbrang chang nad med gyur pa blud //
T13D4310:186b-9: khar dang ni kha ru tsha //
T13D4310:186b-10: go snod da trig star bu dang //
T13D4310:186b-11: shing tsha sug smel na le sham //
T13D4310:186b-12: cha phyed yan lag brgyad par bshad //
T13D4310:186b-13: phal cher bad kan chang na sel //
T13D4310:186b-14: bu ga'i rgyun sbyong drod skyed byed //
T13D4310:186b-15: rtsub dang dro bas ma nye zhing dril //
T13D4310:186b-16: khrus dang kha zas smyung byas dang //
T13D4310:186b-17: 'dod bcas bud med lhan cig gnas //
T13D4310:186b-18: mtshan nyid ma log rig pas bsten //
T13D4310:186b-19: phal cher bad kan las byung ba'i //
T13D4310:186b-20: chang nad myur du zhi bar byed //
T13D4310:186b-21: nad gzhi so so'i shes che las //
T13D4310:186b-22: las rnams gang dag bstan pa 'di //
T13D4310:186b-24: / lhag ma bcu la'ang sbyar bar bya //
T13D4310:186b-25: shing tsha n'a ga pu sha pa dang //
T13D4310:186b-26: pi pi ling dang na le sham /
T13D4310:186b-27: go snyod pa ru sha ka dang //
T13D4310:186b-28: 'u su sug smel ma du ka / thang shing kar dkar dang bcas //
T13D4310:186b-29: ka pid ta yi khu ba btab //
T13D4310:186b-30: ga pur dri yis bsgos gyur pa //
T13D4310:186b-31: btung ba shin tu yid 'ong ba //
T13D4310:186b-32: chang nang kun la blud gyur na //
T13D4310:186b-33: yi ga 'byed cing me drod skyed //
T13D4310:186b-34: chang gis yid ni ma dkrugs shing //
T13D4310:186b-35: lus la gnod pa mi byed par //
T13D4310:186b-36: chang nad mi skyed de yi phyir //
T13D4310:186b-37: sems dgar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bya //
T13D4310:186b-38: chang nad la ni sbyang ba dang //
T13D4310:186b-39: zhi ba'i las ni byas gyur kyang //
T13D4310:186b-40: gal te ma zhi bad kan zad //
T13D4310:186b-41: nyam chung yang ba nyid gyur na //
T13D4310:186b-42: rlung dang mkhris ba shas che zhing //
T13D4310:186b-43: chang nad kyis zad 'o ma blud //
T13D4310:186b-44: so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi //
T13D4310:186b-45: shing las char pa bab dang mtshungs //
T13D4310:186b-46: chang gis zad par bya pa'i mdangs //
T13D4310:186b-47: 'o mas myur du brtas byed de //
T13D4310:186b-48: mdangs dang yon tan kun mtshungs la //
T13D4310:186b-49: chang las go ni bzlog pa yin //
T13D4310:186b-50: 'o mas nad ni bcom gyur cing //
T13D4310:186b-51: stobs skyes nas ni 'o ma yi //
T13D4310:186b-52: chog chang yang bzlog byas te //
T13D4310:186b-53: rim gyis nyung zad nyung spyad //
T13D4310:187a-3: de gnyis la ni 'o ma mar //
T13D4310:187a-4: 'jam rtsi btang bas brta ba bsngags //
T13D4310:187a-5: bsku dang dril phyis khrus dang ni //

T13D4310:187a-9: de la rlung nad la phan chang //
T13D4310:187a-10: phal cher zan chang bu ram chang //
T13D4310:187a-11: mkhris pa rgun chad chu dang bcas //

T13D4310:187a-14: mkhris pa can gyis zos rjes btung //

T13D4310:187a-22: chus gtor rlung yab kyis g-yo byed ;
T13D4310:187a-23: / kha ra rgyun 'brum bu ram shing //
T13D4310:187a-24: 'bra go tang pa la khu ba dang //
T13D4310:187a-25: mngar ba'i sde bskol 'o ma khu //
T13D4310:187a-26: yu she se 'brur bcas pa blud //
T13D4310:187a-27: s'a lu rtsa snar drug cu pa //
T13D4310:187a-28: nas dang 'tsho byed sman mar dang //
T13D4310:187a-29: dge ba chen po tig ta che //
T13D4310:187a-30: srang drug 'o ma ci trar bcas //
T13D4310:187a-31: pi pi ling dang bra gzhun ni //
T13D4310:187a-32: bcud kyis len gyi cho ga sbyin //
T13D4310:187a-33: yang na 'bras bu gsum mar dang //
T13D4310:187a-34: sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa sbyin //
T13D4310:187a-35: shugs drag pa la kha dang sna //
T13D4310:187a-36: bkag par gyur pa phan pa yin //
T13D4310:187a-37: yang na bud med nu zho ni //
T13D4310:187a-38: blud pa'am sna nas gtang bar bya //
T13D4310:187a-39: padma'i rtsa sdong pi pi ling //
T13D4310:187a-40: aa ru ra 'am gla sgang ngam //
T13D4310:187a-41: byi tsher sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sprin //
T13D4310:187a-42: rgya shug tshi gu na le sham //
T13D4310:187a-43: na ga ge sar pu shel tse //
T13D4310:187a-44: chu grang dang ni sbyar ba blud //
T13D4310:187a-45: skyu ru ra yi khu ba'am //
T13D4310:187a-46: aa ru ra mar bskol ba'ang pa na //
T13D4310:187a-47: ji skad bshad pa'i bya bdag / nad gzhi'i shas ni ji bzhin sbyar //
T13D4310:187a-48: las ni rnam lnga byab dang //
T13D4310:187a-49: gtar gas khrag ni dbyung ba dang //
T13D4310:187a-50: snying stobs che zhing shes dang ldan //
T13D4310:187a-51: yul la chags pa med pa phan //
T13D4310:187a-52: myos pa shin tu 'phel gyur dang //
T13D4310:187a-53: brgyal bar gyur ba dag la ni //
T13D4310:187b-0: kun tu zhugs pa'i sman rnon @187b dang //
T13D4310:187b-1: dug las byung ba dug sman gtang //
T13D4310:187b-2: kun tu zhugs la rab rno ba'i //
T13D4310:187b-3: sna sman dang ni mig sman dang //
T13D4310:187b-4: dud pas bud dang khab kyis ni //
T13D4310:187b-5: sen mo'i bar du gzugs par bya //
T13D4310:187b-6: skra 'bal bsregs dang sos btab dang //
T13D4310:187b-7: sdig pa sha sbrang gtses pa dang //
T13D4310:187b-8: mkhur bar tsha dang skyur ba gzhug / kha sral phre'u bdar bar bya //
T13D4310:187b-9: 'du shes rnyed cing ldang gyur nas //
T13D4310:187b-10: sgog skya'i khu ba blud par bya //
T13D4310:187b-11: tsha ba gsum ni lan tshvar bcas //
T13D4310:187b-12: pi dza pu r'i ge sar sbyin //
T13D4310:187b-13: bu ga'i rgyun srang dag bya'i phyir //
T13D4310:187b-14: zas yang tsha dro rno ba sbyin //
T13D4310:187b-15: brjed pa dran phyir ngo mtshar dang //
T13D4310:187b-16: yid 'ong lta dang thos pa dang //
T13D4310:187b-17: glu dang rol mo snyan pa yi //
T13D4310:187b-18: sgra snyan rtsol ba byed du gzhug / slon sman bkru sman btang dus rngub //
T13D4310:187b-19: khrag ni dbyung bar bya ba dag / rgyun mi chad pa spyad par bya //
T13D4310:187b-20: sems stor ba yi rgyu las ni //
T13D4310:187b-22: de ni legs par bsrung bar bya //
T13D4310:187b-23: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
T13D4310:187b-24: gso pa'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o /
T13D4310:187b-26: // / de nas gzhang 'brum gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4310:187b-27: thun mong dus su sprin med par //
T13D4310:187b-28: gzhang 'brum can rab nyam chung min //
T13D4310:187b-29: lto sbyangs kha zas yang la nyung //
T13D4310:187b-30: rjes su mthun pa zos pa la //
T13D4310:187b-31: gtsang byas bde legs 'gyur bar byas //
T13D4310:187b-32: ba shang dang gci bsal gnod pa med //
T13D4310:187b-33: khri'am spang leb mi gzhan gyi //
T13D4310:187b-34: bang par legs brten gnas nas ni //
T13D4310:187b-35: gan rgyal 'dug cing ro stod smad //
T13D4310:187b-36: drang 'dug nyi mar rkub bstan la //
T13D4310:187b-37: rked pa'i phyogs ni bstod par bya //
T13D4310:187b-38: de nas brla dang gnya' bar ni //
T13D4310:187b-39: bcings pa'i gos kyis bsdams nas su //
T13D4310:187b-40: gzung ste drang por 'dug pa la //
T13D4310:187b-41: nad g-yog gis ni bzung nas su //
T13D4310:187b-42: rku ba ni zhun mar dag gis bsku //
T13D4310:187b-43: de nas mar gyis bskus pa yi //
T13D4310:187b-44: cha spyad drang por de gzhug bya //
T13D4310:187b-45: rkub nas phyogs par rim gyis gzhug / de nas 'byung 'gyur mthong ba dang //
T13D4310:187b-46: cha spyad chud par shes gyur nas //
T13D4310:187b-47: gzhang 'brum thur ma gos gsher bas //
T13D4310:188a-2: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis //
T13D4310:188a-3: rlan can thal sman bsreg cig shos //
T13D4310:188a-4: thal sman rnon po'i me yis bsreg / stobs ldan
T13D4310:188a-5: mche ba bcad de bsreg / de nas cha spyad
T13D4310:188a-6: phyung nas ni // nad pa'i rkub dang ro smad bsku //
T13D4310:188a-7: snum gyi nang du 'bying bar bya //
T13D4310:188a-8: de ltar zhag ni bdun bdun zhing //
T13D4310:188a-9: re re nye bar bcos par bya //
T13D4310:188a-10: de nas rlung med khang par ni //
T13D4310:188a-11: bzhag la spyod pa bsten par bya //
T13D4310:188a-12: gzhang 'brum mang la dang por g-yas //
T13D4310:188a-13: de nas g-yon bsal de 'og rgyab //
T13D4310:188a-14: gzhang 'brum mang po bsregs legs na //
T13D4310:188a-15: rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed cing //
T13D4310:188a-16: kha zas 'dod cing me drod skyed //
T13D4310:188a-17: bder gnas stobs dang kha dog skyed //
T13D4310:188a-18: chu gzer gyis btab pa la //
T13D4310:188a-19: ba spru ba dang ru rta dang //
T13D4310:188a-21: sha tapushpa thang shing rnams / zhib tu btags la lde gu yis //
T13D4310:188a-22: lte ba man chad bsku bar bya //
T13D4310:188a-23: bshang dang gci 'gag sa gyur pa la //
T13D4310:188a-24: aa lam bu sa ba ru na //
T13D4310:188a-26: aa za gandha mu ra rnams //
T13D4310:188a-27: bskol ba dro 'jam byas pa yis //
T13D4310:188a-28: blugs dang 'bying ba'i sbyor ba bya //
T13D4310:188a-29: yang na 'o ma snum bcas pa //
T13D4310:188a-30: rlung sel sman bskol til mar sbyar //
T13D4310:188a-31: zas ni bshang ba sla byed cing //
T13D4310:188a-32: snum dang rlung 'joms drod skyed sbyin //
T13D4310:188a-33: de nas bsreg pa mi bya zhing //
T13D4310:188a-34: bad kan rlung skyes phyir byung ba //
T13D4310:188a-35: 'gags shing g-ya' la na zhing skrang //
T13D4310:188a-36: gzhan 'brum bsku ba byas nas ni / bil ba'i
T13D4310:188a-37: rtsa ba tsi tra ka / thal sman ru rta
T13D4310:188a-38: bskol ba yi // til mar blugs pa'am sbrul byil //
T13D4310:188a-39: rnga mo phag rgod zhag gis byug / de rjes rlan dugs kyis dugs bya //
T13D4310:188a-40: yang na gsher dugs spyad par bya //
T13D4310:188a-41: yang na zan ni ti la mar de dang //
T13D4310:188a-42: zhun mar snum can gyis dugs bya //
T13D4310:188a-43: ra sna ha gu sha dag dang /
T13D4310:188a-44: shi kru'i lo ma'i gong pos bya //
T13D4310:188a-45: aarga'i rtsa ba shal ma li'i //
T13D4310:188a-46: lo ma mi skra sbrul lpags dang //
T13D4310:188a-47: byi la'i pags pa mar sbyar ba'i //
T13D4310:188a-48: dud bdugs gzhang 'brum dag la phan //
T13D4310:188a-49: aa shva gandha bri ha ti //
T13D4310:188a-50: byi'u rug pi pi ling mar sbyar //
T13D4310:188b-0: ku ba kha bo'i sa bon dang @188b yal ga 'jam por rang skyur dang //
T13D4310:188b-1: lde gu grib mar skabs pa yi //
T13D4310:188b-2: reng bu rkub bcug gzhang 'brum 'jig / ku ba kha bo'i yal ga rtsa //
T13D4310:188b-3: thal sman bcas pa'i lde gu ni //
T13D4310:188b-4: 'ol ma se dang su ra na //
T13D4310:188b-5: bum sha yi nis bon las //
T13D4310:188b-6: reng bur byas pa de dang 'dra //
T13D4310:188b-7: su dh'a kshi ra yung lde gu //
T13D4310:188b-8: khyim bya'i rtug pa pi pi ling //
T13D4310:188b-9: yung dang 'ol ma se dag ni //
T13D4310:188b-10: ba gcin btags pa de dang 'dra //
T13D4310:188b-11: snu ha'i 'o mar btags shu dag / ta ma la rus pri yang ku //
T13D4310:188b-12: rnam rgyal kar ka ta sring gi //
T13D4310:188b-13: ru rta spangs ma go bye dang //
T13D4310:188b-14: shi kru la phugs bon dang //
T13D4310:188b-15: nim pa ka ra ba'i ra'i lo //
T13D4310:188b-16: pi pi ling gi rtsab dang //
T13D4310:188b-17: bil rtsa shing kun bcas pa'am //
T13D4310:188b-18: ru rta shri sha'i sa bon dang //
T13D4310:188b-19: rgyam tsha bu ram pi pi ling //
T13D4310:188b-21: 'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu bsku //
T13D4310:188b-23: ku ba kha bo'i 'dab ma dang //
T13D4310:188b-24: ka rnyadza dang ra thug gcin //
T13D4310:188b-25: lde gus gzhang 'brum sel mchog yin //
T13D4310:188b-26: 'jam rtsi'i sman ni pi pi ling //
T13D4310:188b-27: la sogs lde gu'ang bsngags pa yin //
T13D4310:188b-28: sman 'di nyid kyis til mar ni //
T13D4310:188b-29: bsku ba'i don du bskol bar bya //
T13D4310:188b-30: dud pas bdug dang lde gu ni //
T13D4310:188b-31: bskus pas gzhang 'brum dag gi khrag / sogs pa 'dzag par byed 'gyur te //
T13D4310:188b-32: de nas bde ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13D4310:188b-33: skrang zhing 'dzag par ma gyur dang /
T13D4310:188b-34: sra ba las ni khrag dbyung ste //
T13D4310:188b-35: bad pa gtsags bu khab kyi ni //
T13D4310:188b-36: pir gyis yang dang yang khrag dbyung //
T13D4310:188b-37: bsil drod snum dang rtsub pa yis //
T13D4310:188b-38: nad ni zhi bar ma gyur na //
T13D4310:188b-39: de phyir sman pas nad khrag nyid //
T13D4310:188b-40: dbyung ba la ni 'bad par bya //
T13D4310:188b-41: 'o ma rtsi tra ka'i rtsa phye //
T13D4310:188b-42: btab pa las byung dar ba dang //
T13D4310:188b-43: blud cing de nyid kyi zas ni //
T13D4310:188b-45: ka pi da ri'i rtsa ba'i phye //
T13D4310:188b-46: dar ba gsar pa btag pa blud //
T13D4310:188b-47: zhu nas phan pa'i zas byin na //
T13D4310:188b-49: gzhang skrang gzer bcas me drod 'bri //
T13D4310:188b-50: skran nad la ni phan pa'i sma //
T13D4310:188b-51: shing kun la sogs blud pa'am //
T13D4310:188b-52: bu ram aa rung sbyar ba //
T13D4310:188b-53: byin la de rjes dar ba blud //
T13D4310:189a-0: @189a * // yang na aa ru byi dang ga / dug mo
T13D4310:189a-1: nyung shun tsi tra ka / dar ba dang sbyar
T13D4310:189a-2: blud pa'am // dug mo nyung dang pi pi ling //
T13D4310:189a-3: ci tra ka dang su ra na //
T13D4310:189a-4: cha res bskyed pa chu dron blud //
T13D4310:189a-5: yang na tsha gsum lan tshva gsum //
T13D4310:189a-6: shing kun star bu bcas chu blud //
T13D4310:189a-7: bil ba ka pid thar bcas pa'am //
T13D4310:189a-8: bca' sga kha ru tsha ba bcas pa'am //
T13D4310:189a-9: go bye la la phud bcas pa'i //
T13D4310:189a-10: skyo ma de la blud par bya //
T13D4310:189a-11: yang na shing kun spa ma'i 'bras //
T13D4310:189a-12: tsi tra ka dang dar ba sbyar //
T13D4310:189a-13: pi lu'i 'bras bu dar bar bcas //
T13D4310:189a-14: zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyin //
T13D4310:189a-15: zas kyi sngon nyid re re zhing ;
T13D4310:189a-16: / ci 'dod par ni blud par bya //
T13D4310:189a-17: shin tu me drod chung ba la //
T13D4310:189a-18: dar ba kho na blud par bya //
T13D4310:189a-19: nyams stobs dus dang gnas shes pa'i //
T13D4310:189a-20: sman pa yis ni dar ba dag / zhag bdun nam ni zhag bcu 'am //
T13D4310:189a-21: zla ba zla gcig bar du blud //
T13D4310:189a-22: yang na phyi dro 'bras yos kyi //
T13D4310:189a-23: phye dang dar ba'i lde gu sbyin //
T13D4310:189a-24: dar ba zhu nas dar ba ni //
T13D4310:189a-25: thug pa rgyam tshar bcas pa blud //
T13D4310:189a-26: de rjes dar bar g-yos pa'i zan //
T13D4310:189a-27: snum can byin la dar ba blud //
T13D4310:189a-28: yu sha'am sha khu dar ba can //
T13D4310:189a-29: s'a lu'i 'bras chen ran par bza' //
T13D4310:189a-30: rtsub dang mar phyed phung ba dang //
T13D4310:189a-31: gang las mar ni ma phyung ba //
T13D4310:189a-32: dar ba nad dang me drod kyi //
T13D4310:189a-33: stobs las de ni rnam gsum sbyar //
T13D4310:189a-34: dar bas legs bcom gyur pa yis //
T13D4310:189a-36: de blugs gyur na rtsa yin //
T13D4310:189a-37: tshogs kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T13D4310:189a-38: rtsa sbubs dar bas dag byas pas //
T13D4310:189a-39: lus zungs dangs mar gyur pa gang //
T13D4310:189a-40: de ni nyams dga' mdog dang stobs //
T13D4310:189a-41: mchog tu rgyas par byed par 'gyur //
T13D4310:189a-42: rlung dang bad kan dag gi nad //
T13D4310:189a-43: brgya phrag dar ba rnying pas 'joms //
T13D4310:189a-45: kanta ka ri'i lde gus bsku //
T13D4310:189a-46: snod du dar ba gsar pa ni //
T13D4310:189a-47: nub gcig gzhag ste blud par bya //
T13D4310:189a-48: 'u su zi ra go snyod dang //
T13D4310:189a-49: pi pi ling gnyis ha pu sha / shu ti pi pi ling rtsa ba //
T13D4310:189a-50: la la phud dang ci tra ka //
T13D4310:189a-51: ya ba na gi'i phye ma dang //
T13D4310:189a-52: dar ba sbyar ba mar gyi snod //
T13D4310:189a-53: bzhag par gyur pa de las skyur //
T13D4310:189b-0: kha ba @189b dang ni rab skyur min //
T13D4310:189b-1: skur dang kha ba bro bar ni //
T13D4310:189b-2: ldang ba'i dang rnying ci 'dod blud //
T13D4310:189b-3: drod skyed mdog bzang yi ga 'byed //
T13D4310:189b-4: rlung dang bad kan sel byed cing //
T13D4310:189b-5: gzhang skrang na bas nyam thag pa //
T13D4310:189b-7: kru trug tres kyi rtsa ba'i shu //
T13D4310:189b-8: btags pa'i lde gus bum pa bsku //
T13D4310:189b-9: der ni 'o ma dang ba gzhag / smin pa'i gzhang 'brum sel byed blud //
T13D4310:189b-10: ga bra'i rtsab aa ru ra //
T13D4310:189b-11: sle tres tsha ba lnga dag la'ang //
T13D4310:189b-12: cho ga 'di nyid sbyar bar bya //
T13D4310:189b-13: pa ta ha ti pi pi ling //
T13D4310:189b-14: shu ti tsha ba lnga g-yar ma //
T13D4310:189b-15: zi ra 'u su bil ba'i rkang //
T13D4310:189b-16: phye mar btags te sbyar bar bya //
T13D4310:189b-17: 'bras bu skyur po mar til mar //
T13D4310:189b-18: yu sha sha khu thug stsogs bya //
T13D4310:189b-19: sman 'di nyid dang chu dang mar //
T13D4310:189b-20: bskol ba'ang drod skyed byed pa yin //
T13D4310:189b-22: rtug pa 'gags pa bshang bya ste //
T13D4310:189b-23: snum stsogs zan dang ldan pa yi //
T13D4310:189b-24: chang dangs lan tshva btab pa blud //
T13D4310:189b-25: yang na dar ba bu ram chang //
T13D4310:189b-26: chang skyur chang dangs lan tshar sbyar //
T13D4310:189b-27: zas mngar mar dang til mar gyis //
T13D4310:189b-28: brngos pa'i ka ranydza'i lo ma //
T13D4310:189b-29: steng du phye btab byin gyur na //
T13D4310:189b-30: rlung gis rtug pa 'gags pa sel //
T13D4310:189b-31: bca' sga bu ram bcas pa'am //
T13D4310:189b-32: ba ta bu ram mar lan tshva //
T13D4310:189b-33: ba gcin la spangs aa ru ra //
T13D4310:189b-34: bu ram bcas pa sbyin pa'ang rung //
T13D4310:189b-35: aa ru ra ni nyis brgya gcin //
T13D4310:189b-36: bre bcu drug tu gcin du'i bar //
T13D4310:189b-37: bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa dag / gnyis gnyis zos nas bad kan gyis //
T13D4310:189b-39: skran dang dmu rtsid gcin snyi 'bu //
T13D4310:189b-40: rmen bu shu bas khyab tsho ches //
T13D4310:189b-42: aa za sring gi rtsa ba yi //
T13D4310:189b-43: lde gu ra gcin sbyar 'thung zhing //
T13D4310:189b-44: bu ram bar ta ka zos na //
T13D4310:189b-46: / dur byid 'bras bu gsum khur sbyar //
T13D4310:189b-47: yang na dar ba aa ru ra'am //
T13D4310:189b-48: pi pi ling bcas aa ru ra //
T13D4310:189b-49: mar dang brngos pa'i bu ram bcas //
T13D4310:189b-50: yang na dur byid dan dar bcas //
T13D4310:189b-51: zos na bde bar 'byung bar byed / gzhang na gnas pa'i nad bsal na //
T13D4310:190a-2: bca' sga bu ram la la phud //
T13D4310:190a-3: pa ta dang sbyar dar ba ni //
T13D4310:190a-4: rlung gis rtug 'gags sel byed yin //
T13D4310:190a-5: rgyun chang yang na bu ra ma chang //
T13D4310:190a-6: bca' sga kru trug tres dang bcas //
T13D4310:190a-7: yang na chang ni pa ta dang //
T13D4310:190a-8: spa 'bras kha ru tsha bcas blud //
T13D4310:190a-9: pi pi ling ni bcu bcus bskyed //
T13D4310:190a-10: til ni srang phyed btab gyur na //
T13D4310:190a-12: me drod skyed par byed pa yin //
T13D4310:190a-13: byi tsher ba dang bil ba dang //
T13D4310:190a-14: la la phud dang dong gra rnams //
T13D4310:190a-15: re re dang sbyar pa tas kyang //
T13D4310:190a-16: gzhang 'brum nad ni sel bar byad //
T13D4310:190a-17: chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang //
T13D4310:190a-18: aa ru ra shun bre phyed dang //
T13D4310:190a-19: skyu ru ra ni bre gang dang /
T13D4310:190a-20: ka pid ta ni srang bcu dang /
T13D4310:190a-21: pi sha la ni srang lnga dang //
T13D4310:190a-22: seng phrom shing tsha na le sham //
T13D4310:190a-23: pi pi ling dang byi dang ga srang ni gnyis gnyis tshad byas bskol //
T13D4310:190a-24: bzhi cha lus btsags bu ram ni //
T13D4310:190a-25: srang ni nyis brgya bcug nas ni //
T13D4310:190a-26: da ta ki ni bre gang gzhug / mar gyi snod du bcug nas ni //
T13D4310:190a-27: zla phyed nas ni chang rnying 'thungs //
T13D4310:190a-28: me drod skyed cing gzhang 'brum dang //
T13D4310:190a-29: pho nad skya rbab mdzod mu rdzing //
T13D4310:190a-30: dbyig du rims skran mchin nang dang //
